name: Debian painted black fork
description:
based on style 4043 by user 3059
lightens a lot of text, darkens a lot of other text, darkens some backgrounds, rounds-off some corners, gives shadows to some headings, coordinates some link colors, removes some of the original rules, removes the lines under links until hovering and radically changes the link colors to match Debian's hot pink
additional_info:
Version 0.4.3—limited paragraph width to simplify reading

Version 0.4.2—fixing the wiki table of contents,
finally fixed search boxes' text (been busy/lazy)
If you find a bug or two or have a suggestion, please start a discussion at the bottom and list the bug(s) or suggestion(s).
Aug 12, 2011
